title: Dream interpretation of pimples on the face, seeing acne in a dream.

preview.text: Dreaming of pimples appearing on the face indicates victory and kindness. Other interpretations, we will explain it to single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as seeing the color red. The appearance of pimples on the face, thigh, lips, or body, or seeing pimples on the chest, or the appearance of blackheads on the hand, or pink pimples on the shoulder or leg, or whoever sees blackheads for a son. Ibn Sirin and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the appearance of pimples on the face in a dream Whoever sees pimples on his face in a dream indicates the worries that the dreamer will face and will leave after a short period. As for whoever sees something unnatural on his face, this indicates a lack in some religious matters, such as not praying or combining tasks. Whether the pimples contain pus or not. It indicates an increase in money The honorable Sheikh and scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in the chapter on diseases, disabilities, illnesses, and pains, section 25, and said in the interpretation of seeing pimples and pimples in a dream, or the interpretation of seeing red spots, despite the disgust and anxiety of most people. People from the appearance and sight of pimples and pimples, but the scholars and commentators unanimously agreed that pimples in a dream are good and victory, especially if a person sees in his dream that these pimples filled and blood or pus came out of them, as it also indicates a lot of money and wealth. Whoever sees red pimples on the face will propose to her if she is unmarried, or she will be affected by envy or the evil eye, or she will be affected by envy after childbirth if she is married. And whoever sees pimples on the neck or face, or his clothes are dirty, this indicates worries, debts, and bad talk, and the appearance of pimples and pimples on the face indicates a lack of religion, such as leaving prayer. As for whoever dreams of the appearance of many sores and pimples on his body, he will get a lot of money according to the quantity and duration. Seeing pimples and pimples on the body in a dream contains some good indications for the fortune teller, and among these indications is that it indicates that a person will get a lot of money, especially if he dreams of getting scabies, smallpox, or sores. or general pimples. Some saw that the grains on the body in a dream indicate a person's victory over others. Whoever sees these grains on the body in a dream has a bad meaning for the dreamer, and among these meanings is the drowning of a person in a swamp of worries, especially if this person sees the grains on his face. If a person sees grains on his body in a dream and a foul smell emanated from these grains, this is evidence that he carries debts and worries, and even insults people to honor his offer because they are upset with him. Seeing many pimples on the face in a dream This vision shows the thinker's neglect of prayer and with great sorrow, and this vision warns and alerts you or alerts you that you are a person who is backward in your prayer or worship in general. Seeing seeds in abundance on the body in a dream indicates financial crises and it is said that it indicates a large number of debts. But there is a difference between crises, there may be crises in his life, and most of us suffer from crises, but this vision may mean for some people an accumulation of debts on him. Seeing grains on the body and the grains bleeding in a dream This vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates acquiring a lot of money in the future, God willing. Seeing your loved ones with grains full of pus and their stench in a dream indicates that people hate him and with great sadness, which means that this vision shows that people do not love you and do not tolerate you and do not tolerate you. I love dealing with you. Seeing pink grains in a dream For those who are not married, marriage, that is, if an unmarried girl sees pink pimples on her body or face, this indicates her marriage, as well as for an unmarried young man. Regarding coffee beans in a dream If it is in the body, it indicates excellence and success for singles and work for married couples. As for the structure of married couples, it indicates the existence of a job or opening a new job opportunity for them. Pink grains appear in a married woman's dream of mutual love between her and her husband. Black beans in a dream And this vision for a married woman indicates providing care for her husband and divorced women and widows are their livelihood, God willing. Seeing many different grains in a dream can be pink, brown, and black grains. This vision indicates the pregnancy of a married woman, and different grains in a dream about a pregnant woman indicate that the newborn will be a girl, God willing. But some scholars who interpret dreams said that the grains that indicate that the newborn is a female are the pink grains, while the brown and black grains indicate that the child will be a male. Meaning the pregnant woman when she sees pink grains, it means that the child is a female. Pregnant, when she sees brown or black grains, the child is a male. Interpretation of grains and spots in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman with pimples or pimples or brown or red spots appearing on her body and skin, foretells her engagement or engagement or marriage if she is of marriageable age, or her promotion at work or her success in her studies. Single woman, the spread of pink grains or their appearance on a part of her body warns of someone's admiration for her and generally describes it as good news for happy and joyful news or good luck and success. Interpretation of grains and spots in a dream for a married woman As for a married woman's vision of the spread of pimples and spots on her body in a dream, it is an indicator of her husband's love for her and his good appearance to her even if he is sixty years old. Pimples in a married woman's dream are a sign of money, livelihood, and profit, whether it be the married woman herself or her husband, especially seeing blackheads because they are a sign of money and livelihood. The best vision for a married woman is to dream of pimples and pimples spreading on her face, hands, or feet, as this indicates safety and reassurance in terms of livelihood and money or in terms of work. It indicates a relationship of love and respect that brings the couple together, or it is a harbinger of healing for the sick, and the best vision is to see large pimples (pimples) from which pus or pus or blood comes out, such a vision warns of the disappearance of worries, problems, and pains, especially if the substance that comes out of these pimples is black. Interpretation of grains and spots in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees grains or spots in her dream, especially the appearance of these grains on her face, is an indicator of the health and safety of the fetus in her womb, while a pregnant woman who sees grains or spots in different parts. of the body is a reflection of her health and safety and self-care, and the more a pregnant woman sees in her dream that the grains ...

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a red garment?

preview.text: Seeing a red dress in a dream is a vision with many interpretations. Many interpreters of dreams have interpreted this dream, such as Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq, among others. The color red is one of the colors that people love, and seeing it in a dream has many different meanings. What is the interpretation of dreaming of a red dress? Seeing a red dress in a dream has many interpretations, as follows: When a woman sees herself wearing red clothes in her dream, this dream is a sign of a happy and bright future. Seeing a red dress in a dream for a sick person can be a warning to him of his impending death. When a poor person sees red clothes in a dream, it may be an indication that he will be harmed soon, God knows best. But seeing red clothes in a dream can mean a lot of food and a lot of money that the dreamer will soon receive. Seeing a red dress in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the auspicious visions that give her good tidings of good, happiness, and pleasure. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations from the most important interpreters. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of dreaming of a red dress: Ibn Sirin believed that seeing the color red in a dream symbolizes the extent of love and emotions that the dreamer carries in his heart. Seeing the color red in a dream is an indication that the person who sees it commits many sins and offenses. Ibn Sirin believes that the color red in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's strength. The interpretation of dreaming of a red dress for a single woman: Some interpreters believe that seeing a red dress in a dream for an unmarried woman is an unfavorable vision, but others see it as a praiseworthy vision that carries nearly good for this girl. Seeing a red dress in a dream for an unmarried girl may be good news of her engagement in the near future. An unmarried girl wearing a short red dress in her dream is an indication of many difficulties and crises in her life. This dream may be an indication that this girl is straying from the path of righteousness and faith and committing some sins and misdeeds. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a sleeveless red dress, it means that her future life will be full of conflicts and difficulties. This vision can be a sign of separation. The interpretation of dreaming of wearing a red dress for a single woman: When an unmarried woman sees the vision of wearing a red dress in her dream, this indicates an improvement in all her affairs and gaining a lot of good. Seeing a red dress for an engaged girl can be good news for her of her wedding date approaching. A short red dress can be an indication of the unmarried girl getting sick soon, God knows best. But when an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a red shirt, it means that she will receive good news soon. This can be an indication of the approaching date of her engagement to the young man she loves. The color red in general in the dream of a woman symbolizes good and happiness. Seeing a red dress in the dream of an unmarried woman is an indication that this girl has great intelligence and will achieve all her hopes and goals in life. The interpretation of dreaming of wearing a long red dress for a single woman: When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a red dress, this is an indication that this girl has a strong personality and an opinion in society. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing red clothes in her dream means that she will soon be linked to a young man and their relationship will be very strong. The unmarried woman who sees a long red dress in her dream indicates that this girl has a relationship with someone and feels love and reassurance with him. Seeing the color red in the clothes of an unmarried girl is evidence of her great distinction among the people around her. If the unmarried woman sees the color red in her dream, this is an indication that this girl will excel in her studies. The unmarried woman who sees red clothes in her dream is an indication that this girl has a special influence and charm in herself. The interpretation of dreaming of a red dress for a married woman: Seeing a red dress in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the mutual feelings of love between her and her husband and enjoying a stable and happy life. Seeing a red dress in the dream of a married woman is an indication of wealth and many profits in the coming period. Seeing a short red dress in the dream of a married woman is an unfavorable vision because it indicates the problems and crises that this woman will face in the coming period. But seeing red clothes in the dream of a married woman indicates an expansion of livelihood. Wearing a red dress in a dream for a married woman: Red is a beautiful and attractive color that many women love. Wearing it in a dream indicates an increase in good and profit. Many interpreters of dreams interpreted it as follows: The red dress is an indication that the seer has many talents. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a red dress in the dream of a married woman can be an indication that this woman commits many sins and she should repent and follow the path of righteousness. Seeing a divorced woman wearing a red dress in her dream is good news for her that she will marry another man soon. This dream may be an indication that she will get a good promotion at work and all her life affairs will improve.  Seeing a red dress in the dream of a married woman may be good news of her impending pregnancy. But when a married woman sees herself wearing a red dress in her dream, this indicates an expansion of this woman's livelihood in the coming period. The interpretation of dreaming of wearing a long red dress for a married woman: If a married woman sees a red dress in a dream, this is an indication of her strong attachment to her husband. But when a married woman sees her husband wearing a red dress, this dream indicates that this woman has some good qualities and morals. This dream can be an indication of an improvement in all aspects of her life and an increase in her love...

title: Dream Interpretation of Trees in a Dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing a fight with a lover in a dream means expressing feelings and other interpretations. We will explain it for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as fighting with your lover in words, arguing with your lover on the phone, or arguing with someone you love, or dreaming that you were arguing with your ex-lover before Ibn Sirin and more. The following topic: Interpreting arguing in a dream.

Seeing an argument with a lover in a dream can be good or bad, as fighting with your lover in your dream symbolizes your desire to express your lover's hidden feelings and proves that there is something deep inside you that you are afraid to share with your lover, so you keep hiding everything. .

Whoever sees an argument with his lover in a dream, this indicates that you may be feeling angry because of repressed feelings and proof that you are thinking of doing something in reality, but there is something preventing you from doing so, so ask yourself what this thing is that stands in your way in working to get rid of it.

If you were arguing with your loved one in a public place, you may have been hurt by something you did in the past, and you may have done something you are not proud of, and now all the negative things that were hidden will appear.

Arguing with your loved one means that you should be wary of the people around you and not fall under their influence, they may have planned to take you and destroy everything you are working on.

Anyone who sees an argument with a lover means that you need to rethink everything you did in the past and think about why someone might hate you, and when you realize that you did something wrong with this person, apologize and try to fix the situation.

Seeing an argument with a lover in the house in a dream symbolizes tensions in your home and proves that these tensions may be between you and your family or even between you and your current partner.

Fighting with your loved one in a dream means that you will feel that there is a lot of negative energy around you and you want to get away from it all. Try to figure out why this situation is happening and find a way to fix things between you and your loved ones.

Arguing with a lover in the mosque in a dream indicates that you want to get closer to the person you are dealing with, but something keeps coming up between you.

In the event that you see yourself arguing with your loved one, this means that problems will come from nowhere and you can't communicate with your partner the right way, maybe you should think more about your actions and realize where you are wrong.

Also, arguing with your loved one means that your partner may need some space to decide what they want in life, so give them some time to think things over.

Dreaming of arguing with your lover symbolizes your desire to communicate with your partner through conversation, maybe you are not very communicative or it may be difficult to reach your partner through conversation, for this reason you can only express what you are thinking and feeling through dreams. Try to practice conversations in real life so that you start to open up to your lover so you don't struggle to maintain your relationship.

Who knows arguing with a lover in the car in a dream, this means that your current relationship is full of risks, you need to contact your partner and ask him what is happening, and constant problems and arguments can lead to separation, and if you want to prevent this, be more insistent in discovering the mistake.

Sometimes a lover finds it difficult to express their feelings the right way, so it's a good idea to start a conversation about this and you should keep in mind that you should be polite and avoid attacking the lover for something because this will prevent you from feeling guilty.

Interpreting an argument with an ex-lover in a dream. If you had a dream that you were fighting with an ex-friend in a dream, this means that you still have some feelings for that person and you feel that you didn't say everything and there is still a lot to do and say to this person. Maybe your relationship ended before you had a chance to express what was on your mind to the other party.

Seeing a fight with your ex-lover is a warning to you that you need to find this person and tell them what you have and in this way everything will be resolved and you will be able to move on with your life.

Interpreting arguing with a lover in a dream to be single. If you are not currently in a relationship but you saw fighting with a lover in a dream, you may be stressed about something.

Arguing with a lover means that you are not happy with the way you are living your life now and you don't know how to get out of this situation. Maybe you love someone, but somehow everything you do is not enough to win over this person and you find it difficult to create a meaningful relationship.

A dream of fighting with a lover tells you that instead of wasting time thinking about how to win this person over or why someone doesn't like you, focus on your own happiness and do something for yourself.

This dream can warn you about how stressed you are and how much time you need to relax, and it is best to take some time to relax and enjoy the things you love doing because you definitely deserve a vacation.

Interpreting a fight with a lover in a dream.

The concept of arguing with a lover in a dream can be a good sign, but in some cases this dream can indicate that someone will bring evil into the viewer's life.

The meaning of the dream of arguing with a lover can be related to the personality, as it symbolizes that the dreamer has a strong personality and an indication that the dreamer needs to fix some things in his life.

On the other hand, dreaming of an argument with a lover is a sign of bad news in the future, and this is also a sign of the presence of negative energy around the dreamer, and he needs to change his face and make some changes to break the routine in his life.

Seeing a fight with a lover in a dream is one of the dreams that many people have and can indicate a shock in your life, or a regret, or a heated argument or even bouts of insomnia. However, if this is not the case, this type of dream is not always a bad sign and can also be a sign that you are going through many radical changes.

If a single girl sees herself arguing with her boyfriend, this means that something is bothering you somewhere in your life.

Interpreting the lover's annoyance in a dream.

Seeing the loved one annoyed in a dream, this vision indicates reconciliation, if he was upset at all. And seeing an upset lover in a dream about a young man, this vision indicates that there is a positive initiative that your lover will take for you.

The conflict with loved ones in a dream is not the same as feeling upset when you wake up, which means that I see the loved one upset, which is a good sign of a good relationship.

Upsetting a family member in a dream indicates that you are hearing good news about that person himself.

And Ibn Sirin narrated that he said: The lover gets angry and cries here.

title: Ibn Sirin's Interpretation of Swimming in a Dream

preview.html:
html

Dreaming of swimming can symbolize success, communication, livelihood, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for single, married, pregnant, divorced women, and men, such as seeing a person swimming in a pool, sea, lake, or swimming in a pool or lake. Or dreaming that I am swimming with people for my son, Ibn Sirin, and Imam Sadiq, among others, in continuation of the subject:

Interpretation of swimming in a dream

Seeing swimming in a dream in general indicates success in love or studies, as well as success in work, or success in general in all matters of life, especially if swimming is easy.

Swimming in a dream also indicates good family bonds, and indicates wealth and abundance of sustenance, especially if swimming is in clear water.

Swimming in murky water or not swimming easily indicates the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces.

If a person sees himself drowning while swimming, or that the water he is swimming in is impure, this indicates failure or a crisis for the visions.

Swimming in a dream, if it is in a pool, indicates wealth and connection between family and social relationships for the owner of this vision.

Perhaps the dream of easy swimming in a dream can be interpreted as the pregnancy of this man's wife in life, God willing.

If you dream of swimming, it means good news, success, if you love swimming, and if you dream that you are drowning while swimming, it means that you will suffer greatly from worries and problems.

Swimming is considered a commendable vision for those who see themselves well in good swimming, and for those who see that they have done swimming for those who are good in the dream means that he will engage in something and be successful in it.

According to the dream interpreter, Muhammad ibn Shirin, it is preferable for the dreamer to wake up after he has stopped swimming and reached safety, rather than regain consciousness while still struggling in the water.

Swimming itself symbolizes the dreamer's challenge to his opponent and the victory that he will achieve over him. If a leader expresses in his dream his desire to swim in murky water, it means that he will wage war against his counterpart. But if he sees himself crossing the sea in a dream, it means that he will surely surpass this leader.

If the researcher sees himself swimming in the sea, it means that he will gain more knowledge and increase his knowledge.

But if someone sees himself swimming towards the shore, it means that he will enter prison and remain there as long as his swimming was easy or difficult, strong or weak.

If a person dreams that he is crossing the valley by swimming to the desired place, this is clear evidence that he will have to submit to one of the tyrannical rulers, but God Almighty will protect him.

If a person dreams that he is swimming in the middle of the sea or in its depths, it means that he will embark on an ambitious task and shine.

As for those who see themselves swimming on their backs, it means that they will repent for their mistakes and ask forgiveness for their actions.

If the dreamer sees himself walking on water, this is evidence that he is pious, receives proof or affirmation of something, and relies on his Lord to embark on a journey full of dangers.

Interpretation of swimming in a dream for Ibn Sirin

  1. The dream interpreter, Muhammad ibn Sirin, said that swimming is praiseworthy and good, and shows self-confidence, and seeing swimming in a well in the middle of the sea in a dream indicates an increase in knowledge.
  2. Seeing swimming on land is unacceptable and may indicate imprisonment
  3. As for swimming in a valley with little running water and reaching the other side, this indicates that you will benefit, especially if you have a problem with the authorities.
  4. And seeing swimming with a feeling of drowning is a sign that you are facing problems in life
  5. When you see yourself swimming with your enemy, it is a symbol of victory
  6. But if you see that you are swimming professionally, this symbolizes that you are facing your past problems, feelings and sorrows with confidence and strength, which means that you will one day be able to overcome the inner depression that you live in.
  7. Swimming in a dream also indicates that you are an ambitious person who is confident in your abilities in life and your attractiveness on an emotional and social level.
  8. If you see that one of your children is swimming in a dream, this indicates your concern for his future and your fear that he will drown in life in problems and difficulties that he may not be able to escape from.
  9. If you see that you are learning to swim, it means that you are making an effort to continue or adapt to a new environment
  10. If you see in a dream that you are swimming against the current, it means that you are facing pressures and opinions that you face in reality. Check again that your choices are in the right place
  11. If you see that you are swimming with someone or other people, it means that you share the same feelings or the same projects and aspirations.
  12. Diving or swimming underwater means that you will enter into new relationships
  13. If the seawater is unclean, this indicates a problem that you will face in the near future, and if there is garbage in the sea, this indicates that you are worried about one of your friends.

Interpretation of swimming in a dream for Ibn Shaheen

It is said that whoever dreams that he swims and then quarrels with his opponent and defeats him and defeats him, and whoever sees that he is swimming in the water has escaped from him before he notices his sleep, this indicates his kindness from his concern. Sleeping while swimming in the water, and whoever dreams that he walks on the river or the sea, this indicates the soundness of certainty and good religion, as it is said that swimming is an affirmation of something belonging to its owner, which he doubts, and if it is about to travel, this journey is in danger.
If a scholar dreams that he is swimming in the sea, his knowledge has reached what he needs, and if he dreams that he is floating in a wide valley until he reaches the place he wants, this indicates that he intervenes in the actions of a tyrannical unjust ruler, and if the scholar sees that he is floating on the ground, this dream warns the scholar from prison, and lives in his prison according to the ease of swimming or difficulty swimming, and according to the strength of the scholar in swimming.

Seeing yourself swimming in a lake in a dream shows the mistakes you will realize and that you will commit to not repeating these mistakes and you will take many spiritual steps that will change you and you will strive to achieve peace.

Seeing yourself swimming in the ocean or swimming in the ocean indicates that the owner of the vision is moving away from the place where he grew up and the place where he was born and will live alone to feel confident and will take many steps that will make his name grow and become more famous among people.

Interpretation of swimming in a dream for a single woman

Swimming in a single girl's dream refers to her partner or other lover. Indicates many problems in her love life with her other partner. .

If the single girl sees herself swimming in dirty water or drowning, this ...

title: The interpretation of a long skirt in a dream, seeing oneself wearing a long skirt in a dream.

preview.html:
html

Seeing a skirt long indicates kindness and abundant provision, and other interpretations that we will explain for single, married, pregnant, divorced women, such as wearing a black skirt , or buying a red skirt, or wearing a white skirt below the knee, according to Ibn Sirin , and more:

Interpretation of a long skirt in a dream

It means a long skirt in a dream, and according to its natural length or purity and beauty of its shape, there are many indications. Whoever saw that she was wearing a long skirt in a dream that covers her legs from below, it was not dirty or torn. Then she gets good and livelihood and her skirt covers all her legs.

And if she is married and saw herself in a dream wearing a long skirt, this indicates her great happiness, which may be with pregnancy or joy with her children or kindness with her husband.
Wearing a skirt in a dream of a pregnant woman is a guarantee for her and it is said that she will give birth to a son who will protect her in her world, just as the perfect dress protects a woman from the eyes of wolves.

But if the skirt reveals some of the legs and part of the leg below it, anyone who sees that can be accused of a difficult matter to the point that it reveals her legs and almost reaches the knee of the leg or higher. , where it can reach the category of vulgarity or display
For a married woman, there may be an indication of a period of disagreement or poverty, its length is short like a skirt, and for a pregnant woman, there is pain or a feeling of disappointment during a transient period, and for the unmarried girl, it can be an accusation of what was mentioned previously, or that she enters into a forbidden relationship that starts with talking to a person who has no morals and seeks only his lust.
As for the married or pregnant girl who sees herself wearing a torn or very short skirt in front of people, this indicates a scandal for her, her news will spread to the public, and the married woman may have a lack of money. and extreme poverty, the daughter's choices may be bad and she will regret it, and the pregnant woman may be deceived and lied about by those around her.
And if tears and dirt gather in the skirt, the wearer of that skirt will face difficulties and fears and spend her life in severe distress, which will lead her to want to die because of the deeds she has done.
When you see a long skirt that has exceeded the required limit to the point where it touches the ground or leaks on the dirt when walking, this indicates an increase in happiness, good, health and joy in the same spinster, married or pregnant. girl. .
If you saw a new skirt in a dream, its interpretation is that your pride and your pride in what matters to you will make you the subject of ridicule among your friends.
If you dream of a torn or dirty skirt or clothes, it means that your reputation will be shaken and threatened.
But if the girl dreams that she is wearing a transparent or silk skirt, it means that she will find a husband.
If she discovers that she has unintentionally removed her skirt while wearing it, it means bad luck and disappointment.
And if she sees her skirt falling from its place while she is walking in the street, it will be difficult for her to hold on to her lover and she may be followed by other problems and fears.
If you dream that you are wearing a skirt, the dream indicates the hidden signs and messages that you convey or send, and it also symbolizes your femininity and your view of gender.
The dream can also be a metaphorical expression of the problem that you are trying to "go around" more and not face it head-on.
If you are a man and dream that you are wearing a skirt, the dream indicates that you need to get to know the emotional sides of your personality.
Seeing a long skirt in a dream indicates that this vision refers to people who want to do lasting deeds and who want history to record their names and have a great position in the eyes of people.

Interpretation of a long skirt in a dream for Ibn Sirin

Seeing a long skirt in a dream It indicates the life of the visionary, which will continue steadily, and this vision also shows the respect that the visionary will receive and achieve what he wants without falling into the traps of others.
And the long skirt in the unmarried girl's dream shows the new job she will do, and the long skirt in the little girl's dream shows that you will be an employer.
As for the long skirt in the married man's dream, this vision shows the respect and appreciation he will receive from his family and those around him and he will be a person who loves the people around him always because he is a person with good morals and behavior, and many people around him will appreciate him.

The dream in which you wear a long skirt indicates that you are reaping the fruits of your labor and that the vision is an indication that you are a reserved or passive person and you may feel unable to express your strength and authority.
To dream of a long skirt in a dream is a sign of self-expression and communication and an indication that you need to be able to clearly distinguish your choices so that you can abandon the wrong choices.

Wearing a long skirt in your dream is an indication of your bad eating habits and that you need to add some nutrients to your diet.
It means seeing a skirt long that you need to put your plan into action and that you need to face life's obstacles and stress with more endurance.

Your dream is an indication of your desire to belong to a larger group or develop an aspect of your personality on a more general level. You may underestimate or overestimate something or a relationship, so be careful not to cause the loss of a relationship or a person.

The appearance of a long skirt in your dream is a sign of your fears that you will not be able to deal with the pressures of daily life, and the vision is a sign that you may feel very comfortable in some situations, but you do not actually know the reality of these situations.

If you saw a long skirt in a dream, it means that you are ready to get rid of all the extra problems that are hindering you, and this dream symbolizes a negative shift in events, but it will end well, God willing. , this dream means that there is something you are forced to face now. .

The long skirt in this dream indicates your special relationships that you should care for and take care of, because they will benefit you in the field of work.

Wearing a long skirt in a dream this means that someone there is always listening to you and taking your words seriously and this dream means that you may be behaving inappropriately in certain situations.

The dream of a long skirt is also evidence of emotional incompetence or fear of incompetence, and you may feel neglected in your relationship or that your feelings are being ignored.

A dream of a long skirt indicates...

title: The dream interpretation of Surah An-Nur according to Ibn Sirin and other prominent scholars.

preview.text:
## The Surah of An-Nur (The Light) in a Dream

**General Interpretation**
Reciting the Holy Quran and pondering the meanings of its verses is an important act of worship that illuminates the soul and fills the heart with humility and faith.  Surah An-Nur is particularly considered to be a Surah with great reward. Persistence in reading or listening to it brings blessings and joy.  There are many interpretations for this dream, which we will explore below.

**Expert Interpretations**
Experts interpret seeing Surah An-Nur in a dream as a sign of abundant provision. The dreamer will experience plentiful blessings and prosperity in their life, alongside improved health and recovery from illness. God will grant them healing and well-being, enabling them to work diligently, provide for their family, and achieve their aspirations, by God's will. 

If the dreamer recites Surah An-Nur, or hears it recited, it indicates their piety, righteousness, and dedication to drawing closer to God. They are committed to promoting good and forbidding evil, abstaining from sins and transgressions. God rewards them with peace, tranquility, and success in their endeavors.

**Ibn Sirin's Interpretation**
Ibn Sirin considered seeing Surah An-Nur in a dream a positive sign. If one sees themselves reading Surah An-Nur, it indicates that they are righteous, praising God, and seeking closeness to Him through piety and good deeds.  God will send light into their heart, granting them prosperity, ease, and happiness in their life. This dream also signifies that their grave will be illuminated, paving their path to Paradise, by God's will. It further suggests that they will achieve a high level of knowledge and approach matters with wisdom and reason, becoming a leader in their field.

If the dreamer feels confused and lost in their life, seeing Surah An-Nur suggests that God will guide them and illuminate their path. This dream encourages them to follow Islamic law and the Prophet's teachings in all aspects of their life. Conversely, if the dreamer is on a path of delusion and prohibited acts, seeing Surah An-Nur symbolizes divine grace and sincere repentance. God will enable them to guide others and teach them the fundamentals of Islam, earning them rewards in this life and the hereafter.

**An-Nabulsi's Interpretation**
Imam An-Nabulsi clarified that seeing Surah An-Nur indicates that the dreamer's life will improve for the better. God will enlighten their mind and perception, making them wiser and more balanced in dealing with matters. As a result, they will receive great rewards, and God will illuminate their grave.  

He concluded his interpretations by explaining that this vision is a good omen of repentance, drawing closer to God, refraining from sin and impurities, embracing obedience and good deeds, and achieving peace of mind.

**Seeing Surah An-Nur in an Unmarried Woman's Dream**
Seeing Surah An-Nur in an unmarried woman's dream is a very positive vision. It suggests that her life will be blessed with justice, completeness, and abundant goodness. Her dreams and desires will be fulfilled by God's will, thanks to her commitment to performing obligatory acts of worship, her good character, and virtuous qualities.  Some interpreters say that hearing Surah An-Nur recited in her dream signifies good health, God knows best.

If she sees herself reading Surah An-Nur with reverence and weeping, it indicates the strength of her faith and her fear of God's judgment and punishment.  She fears God in her actions, constantly assists the poor and needy, avoids suspicion, possesses strong faith and noble morals, and will experience happiness, security, and tranquility. 

**Seeing Surah An-Nur in a Married Woman's Dream**
If a married woman is seeking pregnancy and using all means to achieve motherhood but has not yet conceived, seeing herself listening to Surah An-Nur alongside her husband is a promising sign of impending pregnancy and a blessed child. God will bestow upon her offspring good health, and they will be known for their good conduct among people. 

If she is struggling financially, burdened with worries and responsibilities, and unable to provide for her family, the dream carries good news of abundant provision, blessings, and prosperity in her life. God will guide her husband to a profitable job, increasing their financial standing and enabling them to achieve their desired goals.

**Seeing Surah An-Nur in a Pregnant Woman's Dream**
Surah An-Nur delivers a comforting message to a pregnant woman who might be experiencing health issues or emotional distress due to her fear for the baby and her constant desire for reassurance. This dream signifies that she will pass through this period safely, with significant improvement in her health, leading to a period of stability and peace of mind. God willing, she will have a smooth delivery, free from obstacles and severe physical pain.

Seeing Surah An-Nur is a sign that she will have a healthy baby boy. It is also favorable if the dreamer reads Surah An-Nur themselves, engages with its verses, and reflects on its meaning. This will help them overcome the issues that cloud their life, causing them distress and sorrow. If they face financial hardship, they will overcome it, and their life will be filled with material abundance. 

**Seeing Surah An-Nur in a Divorced Woman's Dream**
If a divorced woman is struggling with difficulties and conflicts in her life, causing her to feel fear and anxiety about the challenging circumstances that may lie ahead, seeing Surah An-Nur in a dream is an auspicious omen. It signifies that her affairs will be eased, her burdens lifted, and her circumstances transformed for the better. She will also experience good health after years of illness and hardship.

Surah An-Nur is a message for her to persevere with patience and strong faith, enabling her to overcome the challenges she faces, bringing greater calm and stability to her life. She will also experience abundant provision, blessings, and goodness in her life, paving the way for success and the fulfillment of her long-held goals.

title: Dream Interpretation: Receiving Glasses as a Gift in a Dream

preview.html:
html

Dream interpretation of receiving glasses as a gift in a dream Some people seek to determine the interpretation of a dream about receiving glasses as a gift in a dream, which is one of the most disturbing dreams, so they search for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader should refrain from believing entirely, because it is from the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, and to be on the right path, the site and its administrators are not related to interpretations.

Interpretation of a dream of a gift of glasses in a dream

  • Giving glasses in a dream may indicate the good events that will come to the owner of the vision in his life in those days, by the grace of God.
  • Whoever dreams of receiving glasses as a gift in a dream may indicate marriage if he is a young unmarried man or to good events coming to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best.
  • Dreaming of receiving glasses as a gift in a dream may indicate that it may indicate relief from the financial crises that he suffered in the previous period, and God knows best.
  • If you see a gift of glasses in a dream, it may indicate the stability of the family and family that they enjoy during this time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of giving a child in a dream

  • Receiving a child as a gift in a dream may indicate the abundant money that the owner of the vision may receive in his life during this time.
  • It is possible that seeing a child giving a gift in a dream indicates relief from the difficulties that the owner of the vision faced in his life in those days.
  • Dreaming of having a child in a dream may indicate positive changes that may occur to the dreamer in his life during this period.
  • If a person sees a girl as a gift in a dream, this may indicate the happiness that comes to the dreamer in those days of his life, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of giving grape leaves in a dream

  • Giving grape leaves in a dream may indicate the blessings and goodness that the subordinate may receive in his life during this time.
  • In case I personally saw that he took grape leaves in a dream, this may indicate that he is in good health and free from health crises that he suffered for a long time.
  • Dreaming of returning grapes in a dream may indicate the wide life that the owner of the vision may achieve during this period, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that the vision of receiving grape leaves as a gift in a dream indicates getting rid of the worries and sorrows that the owner of the vision suffered in his life, and he gained the period and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of a gift of a plate of sweets in a dream

  • Giving a plate of sweets in a dream may indicate the love that the owner of the vision enjoys with those around him in those days, and God knows best.
  • Dreaming of receiving a plate of sweets as a gift in a dream may indicate the mutual love between him and that person, and God knows best.
  • In case of seeing a gift of a plate of sweets in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of goodness that the owner of the vision enjoys in his life during those days.
  • Dreaming of a person giving a plate of sweets to those around him in a dream may indicate the happiness and good that the owner of the vision does for those around him at this time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of Eid cake as a gift in a dream

  • Giving Eid cakes in a dream may indicate good to come to the dreamer during this time, by the grace of God.
  • Dreaming of Eid cakes as a gift in a dream may indicate the nature of the person and his good morals.
  • If you see a gift of Eid cake in a dream, it may indicate getting rid of debt or a financial crisis that the owner of the vision suffered in his life, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that seeing a gift of Eid cakes in a dream indicates changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of providing a sewing machine in a dream

  • Receiving a sewing machine as a gift in a dream may indicate the intimate relationship and affection that exists between them and that person.
  • Dreaming of a sewing machine as a gift in a dream may indicate the rapid spread of truth and the elimination of falsehood, by the grace of God.
  • Whoever sees in a dream that he received a sewing machine as a gift may indicate the happy events that may come his way at that time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of a camel gift in a dream

  • Receiving a camel as a gift in a dream may indicate marriage to a very intelligent woman, by the grace of God.
  • Dreaming of receiving a camel as a gift in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the owner of the vision may acquire in his life during this time, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that seeing a camel as a gift in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that seeing a camel giving a gift in a dream indicates relief from the psychological fatigue and tension that the owner of the vision suffered for a long time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of providing sunglasses in a dream

  • Giving sunglasses in a dream may indicate relief from a serious experience that the owner was suffering in his life at that time, and God knows best.
  • Dreaming of receiving sunglasses as a gift in a dream may indicate the end of a danger or problem that the owner of the vision was facing in his life during those days, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that seeing sunglasses as a gift in a dream may indicate getting a helping hand to get rid of some of the problems and difficulties that the owner of the vision faces in his life during this period.
  • Whoever sees in his dream that he received sunglasses as a gift in a dream may indicate his sadness, and the owner of the vision was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of giving a cactus plant in a dream

  • If you gave us a cactus plant in a dream, it may mean the end of some fears that the owner of the vision was facing in his life in those days, by the grace of God.
  • Dreaming of giving a cactus plant in a dream may indicate the sorrows that the owner was facing and that he will get rid of them by the grace of God in the coming days.
  • It is possible that seeing a cactus plant in a dream indicates getting rid of the problems and fears that the owner of the vision faces in his life during this period, and God knows best.
  • Seeing a cactus plant in a dream may indicate overcoming difficulties and problems in the life of whoever saw those days, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of giving cooked meat in a dream

  • Giving cooked meat in a dream may indicate earning some money during this time, by the grace of God.
  • Dreaming of giving cooked meat in a dream to the dreamer may indicate that he will receive a large financial assistance during this time, and God knows best.
  • It is possible that seeing cooked meat as a gift in a dream indicates the financial gains that the dreamer can get in his life during this period.
  • It is possible that seeing a gift of cooked meat in a dream indicates good changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life in those days, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of giving a bouquet of flowers in a dream

  • Receiving a bouquet of flowers as a gift in a dream may indicate many good things that will come to its owner…

title: Dream interpretation of turnips and eating turnips in a dream

preview.text: The dream of chalgham shows a strong woman and other interpretations for the single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman, and man like eating white chalgham, or buying red chalgham, or eating turnip according to Ibn Sirin but continuing the topic: Interpretation of chalgham in a dream Seeing chalgham in a dream indicates a strong and curious villager. It was said that breaking the dream indicates tension and sadness that will befall the dreamer. If you see the thin corn growing, it means that your horizons will brighten, your life will improve, and you will be very excited about your success. Eating chalgham in a dream is a sign of ill health and suffering from disease. Harvesting thin corn in a dream indicates an improvement in your opportunities and an increase in your wealth. Eating green cabbage in your dream is a sign of bitter disappointment. Rape seeds in a dream are a sign of progress in the future. If an unmarried girl plants chalgham seeds, it means that she will inherit good luck and have a handsome husband. The dream in which you see chalgham means that you will be lucky in the future and that your close acquaintances and true friends will support you. If the dreamer sees that he is eating chalgham, it means that there are some reasons to worry about someone in the family. If you sow ash on the ground, it means that all plans and goals will be realized and you will succeed. Sometimes chalgham in a dream means a slight disappointment that goes unnoticed. If the chalgham is strong and ripe, it means that you will have some adventures in the coming days, and these events will bring you a lot of impressions and stay in your memory for a long time, and sometimes it may mean building relationships with friends or finding a solution to all problems. If you dream of a rotten heavy chalgham, it means that you will not be able to avoid disappointment, and if you are planning to participate in a holiday or party, it is likely to be delayed. Seeing a large number of chalghams in a dream, whether fresh or rotten, this dream warns of conspiracies of enemies. If one chooses a few pieces of chalgham from the pile and eats them, it means that one will not be able to avoid or prevent the attacks of enemies. And if you refuse to eat chalgham, the plots will end and will not cause any harm. A dream of an immature young chalgham means that you are missing every opportunity to achieve your goals and there will be no result for your work. If you cut the cane in a dream, it means that there will be no changes for the better in the near future. The bitter straw in a dream indicates hard and long work that you will have to do in the near future, but the result of this work will be great success, but it is important to complete it and not give up on any problem. If an unmarried girl or young woman dreams that she is planting a field or garden using ash, it means that she will soon marry a very rich man. It is possible that a wealthy relative has left her all of her inheritance. And if he sees that the thin corn is growing, this is evidence of success, while the dream in which he eats the corn indicates possible health problems. Interpretation of a cold storm in Ibn Sirin's dream The dream of chalgham is a symbol of the higher knowledge and wisdom that the dreamer possesses and the vision is a sign that you are seeking balance in your life. Seeing a tree in a dream means that you know the course of action you should take and move forward in a fruitful way. This dream also shows your relationship with someone, but you can put your work or ambitions first before your loved ones. Seeing chalgham is a sign of respect and a sign that you may give up something you once believed in. The mud in the dream symbolizes your desire to enjoy everything that life has to offer. Whoever sees chalgham in a dream means that he has the ability to stand on his own feet in times of turmoil and overcome difficult circumstances. Chalgham shows eternal beauty and this vision is a sign that you are hiding who you really are. Dreaming of a heavy chalgham indicates your talents and your ability to communicate with others. The dream of chalgham indicates the successful completion of your tasks, and eating it means that you need encouragement. Chalgham is a root vegetable and chalgham symbolizes a different side of human dynamics and can mean gratitude to a stranger or strangers for their help to you. If you dream of seeing or eating chalgham, it means that you will be able to easily solve some health problems or improve your physical condition at this time. Chalgham is a symbol of wealth, success, prosperity, and even empathy for others. If you dream that you are being spoiled, it means that you will be able to enjoy a trip or a valuable gift very soon. Dreaming of canola that you plant in your garden is a harbinger of incredible prosperity for you this year. Interpretation of chalgham in Imam al-Saduq's dream Dreaming of a heavy chalgham is a sign of difficulty communicating with others, and this vision suggests that you need to carefully consider the situations you find yourself in. Seeing shellfish in your dream means that you are about to lose control. Your dream of a heavy chalgham indicates anticipated pleasures, increasing responsibilities, and increasing tension that you will feel. Eating chalgham in a dream means that you are surrounded by people who accept you for your mistakes and weaknesses. Sometimes breakage indicates guilt and this vision indicates that you are looking for some guidance to deal with your feelings and you may feel emotionally or physically exhausted. Dreaming of a heavy chalgham is a sign of your fear of commitment and evidence that you are not ready for changes in your life. The dream of straw symbolizes the direction of your life and the decisions you have made, and this vision indicates that you are behaving inappropriately. Cracked in a dream indicates frustrated hopes and means that your problems will multiply. Dreaming of chalgham indicates your need for organization and order, and indicates that you should take care of the needs of others instead of pursuing your own happiness. Whoever sees chalgham in his dream means that he may feel alienated. Dreaming of a heavy chalgham indicates hearing some words directed at you or someone else. Eating chalgham in a dream means that you will try to make the most of all the situations you may find yourself in, even the negative ones. Interpretation of chalgham in Ibn Sirin's dream Dreaming of chalgham is an indication of your desire to talk about something that you keep to yourself only. Your dream of chalgham indicates longevity or continuity or courage, but it also indicates that you will remain stuck in the memories of the past and refuse to move on to anything fruitful. Chalgham indicates the pressures of old age. Chalgham in your dream indicates problems or responsibilities at work, and this vision indicates that you may grieve for something or someone. Seeing chalgham in your dream means that you will eventually overcome and get rid of unnecessary external claims. Chalgham in a dream indicates something that you are trying to convey or express from the heart. Eating chalgham in a dream means that you will feel judged or…
